titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for the lying in state of the remains of the late Honorable John Sidney McCain, III.
A concurrent resolution authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for the lying in state of the remains of the late Honorable John Sidney McCain, III.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Without objection, the Chair laid S.Con.Res. 44 before the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Authorizes the use of the Capitol rotunda on August 31 and September 1, 2018, for the lying in state of the remains of John Sidney McCain, III, a Senator from Arizona and formerly a Representative from that state.
